website_summaries.verdict: A smooth operator, this foot file features convex curved rollers to really get in there and roll with the curvature of your foot.
pros: This long-lasting foot file can run continuously for up to 45 min
Its ergonomic grip is comfortable to hold and control the amount of pressure applied
Pressure sensitive technology saves it from going in too deep
It's also water resistant, making it easy to clean
cons: Rollers dull quickly, so keep some replacements on hand

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: I want to share something! My mom was in the hospital for two months and a a result her feet got really bad and dry. Finally she is home and I was only able to give her about a 3 minute treatment before her feet were ticklish and LOOK AT THE difference!! Wow thank you so much.
customer_reviews.author: Analeah

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Callus Reducer
customer_reviews.text: Initial use of this product revealed a device which has the power to do the callus reduction promised. I will need to continue to use the product to see if it mechanically is capable of holding up to durability. However about 2 weeks after the deadline for returning the product, something inside broke and now the sanding wheel doesn't rotate rendering the device useless. I contacted the company and nearly immediately they had a replacement shipped to me. Great customer service, and I would highly recommend this product and the great customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Keith L. Seidenstricker

customer_reviews.title: At least a thousand percent better than Amope
customer_reviews.text: At least a thousand percent better than Amope, doesn't stop when you apply slight pressure. I wear flip-flop about 98% of the time, year round, and have terrible calusus on my feet and this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Middle Sister

customer_reviews.title: used it Friday night and loved it. Used it again Saturday night and all ...
customer_reviews.text: Well I received this on Friday, used it Friday night and loved it. Used it again Saturday night and all of a sudden the roller stopped turning and hasn’t worked since. So disappointed and now I have to go thru the trouble of returning it. I live 45 minutes from the closest ups store and then have to wait on account to be credited. Definitely trying a different brand next time.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Dixon

customer_reviews.title: Works 100% as expected! Amazing Results!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this little gadget! It’s a must have in my beauty routine. After a winter of pregnancy and wearing UGG boots my heels and feet looked awful. There was so much dead thickened and calloused skin and it looked awful. First time I used this there was a dramatic difference. The pictures done lie. I buy probably thousands of items for my family each year from amazon, and only write a review when a product exceeds my expectations. Highly recommend this! My before and after pic is literally after using it one time and putting some basic lotion on afterwards to seal in moisture and prompt healing.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: You should know...😡
customer_reviews.text: The mineral roller can only be removed once. Forget swapping between course and fine grade. Once you the release button the guide pins retract permanently. I would have thought it was broken if I didn't have finger pricker to test your blood that can switch needles what had having to replace it every time with a cartridge. But if you click through a number without stopping you lose a needle and if you pulled on the cartridge you lose all the needles would be the best comparison I can come up with. Probably gonna return it. Not happy about a poor design feature.
customer_reviews.author: notmyname

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best callous remover I’ve used and their customer service is outstanding! I highly recommend this product not just because it works great, but they are an awesome staff!
customer_reviews.author: Karla M Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Such a let down.  Don't waste your money or time.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited for this to work and be awesome, but it just wasn't. I used it once. It did a fair job of removing the top layer of dead skin. (I certainly didn't expect for it to remove all calluses in one use.) At the end of my use, it stopped working, so I thought that the battery had just died. I charged it for almost 24 hours and just tried to use it again, but it's broken...AFTER ONE USE! The motor is still whirring but the roller doesn't spin at all. Such a let down! Don't waste your time or money on this product. Just go buy a pumice stone and remove calluses the old fashioned way.
customer_reviews.author: MissComunikation

customer_reviews.title: Great tool when it work - which it doesn't last long :(
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item Dec 2018. After only 8 months, the device stopped working. The company was nice enough to send us a replacement in Aug 2019. Now, only a few months later (Nov 2019), the replacement device stopped working as well and it will not accept a charge. We've not used either device under water/in the shower, we have not kept them on the charger all the time, we've taken good care of them, and the charger/cable is in good condition... When it's working, it's a great tool, however it doesn't last long at all. I wouldn't recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jacky

customer_reviews.title: Does Not Last! (Replacement Doesn’t Either!)
customer_reviews.text: Bought in May. Worked OK for 2 months and now has hardly any power even after recharging for 8 hours. Starts off good then fizzles out after a minute or so. Piece of junk! Update 8/26: The vendor sent me a replacement unit which lasted a few weeks. I charge it 8 hours and can use it for maybe 1 minute and it dies. In the garbage it goes!
customer_reviews.author: Ronsec

customer_reviews.title: Vendor insists I email my address
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product for TWO WEEKS. The head just stopped spinning. After two weeks of infrequent use. Update: after writing this review I received an email insisting I reply with my address so they can ship a replacement. I replied saying please use the address I gave to Amazon (which they used two weeks ago to ship the faulty product) because I don’t want to supply that outside the Amazon process. They refuse “in case I moved.” Really?
customer_reviews.author: S. Lacy

customer_reviews.title: Soft feet without effort
customer_reviews.text: Only gave 4 stars because charging light doesn't turn green when fully charged. Not sure if you can overcharge the unit. Other than that, it works great! Used another brand before this. Does not compare. Was going thru the batteries like crazy with the other brand. This one is rechargeable. Saves lots of money in batteries alone. The price is great and the replacement heads won't cost you more than the unit itself. Many other brands replacements do. That's the main reason I went for this unit. Smooths rough feet nicely and without effort. Very happy I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: JackiTop Contributor: Nail Art

customer_reviews.title: A GOOD BUY. This works....
customer_reviews.text: Summary: I bought these for my hard working feet. My feet get dry because of the rubber footwear I'm required to wear at work. I have tried the stainless steel file, but this electric shaver works better because it grinds much more evenly. Pros: 1) Sands evenly. 2) Good battery life. 3) Easy to hold. 4) Easy to change rollers. 5) Good design. 6) Comes with 3 rollers. Cons: 1) Don't use this on toes...it catches the skin. 2) Relatively long charging time.
customer_reviews.author: JKN

customer_reviews.title: Works on hand calluses too.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't buy this for feet so I cannot attest to that. However, my husband works out at least 4 hrs a day. He does Olympic lifting, gymnastic movements and such. His hands were tearing constantly and were rough and sharp to the point he didn't want to touch my "soft skin" because he didn't want to hurt me. I got him this and he LOVES it!!! It takes 10 hours to charge and he can use it multiple times per charge. No messing with batteries taking them out and putting them in losing the batteries or having them unexpectedly die. He's had zero complaints about it and his hands are so much better.
customer_reviews.author: As I see it.

customer_reviews.title: Fast roller!
customer_reviews.text: Update: I have received an email from the seller who sent me again the product. I've used it a few times now and have not run into the issues mentioned below. The seller was extremely friendly, had quick responses, and handled everything with grace and professionalism. I was glad for the opportunity to use this product again, as the fast roller is effective in removing calluses. Thanks! The callus remover worked the first two times and then just stopped being as effective. I even swapped out the stones and charged it to green, but it seems to operate at a 20% battery level/strength and frequently stops. I've already past the window to return. I'm going to buy a better version.
customer_reviews.author: skyfox02

customer_reviews.title: To be honest, it TAKES TOO LONG to get ...
customer_reviews.text: To be honest, it TAKES TOO LONG to get my feet sanded up. The motor is so gutless, I know they are trying to "protect" people with this less power device, but if you press hard in any way to get it "done" on a thick callous, the wheel is going to immediately stop, and so you have to let it just sand so gently, so SLOWLY, and the only thing that lets you know it is working is some occasional dust that comes off your foot. Wish it were STRONGER.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at first, but broke after its first use...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item, and it worked great during its first use. Towards the end of using it for the first time, the roller stopped circulating. Basically the product broke after the first use. I wasn’t overly concerned, because the warranty states that they will replace the product if something goes wrong with it. All you have to do is send them an email. It’s has been several days since I sent my email, and I still haven’t heard back from them. I waited to post this review, because I wanted to give them the benefit of the doubt and provide them with time to respond. Needless to say, their customer service in responding to issues is lacking...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Collier

customer_reviews.title: It works but it is slow
customer_reviews.text: It works but it is SLOW. This is more like a finish sander , and if you have thick calluses you need to start out with something like a industrial grinder! It just takes forever to remove any thickness. On the plus side it is easy to hold and maneuver,and much quieter than a sander. Also for being a battery operated tool, I am impressed with the battery life, but it does bog down if you apply too much pressure.....but it seems to remove material faster with a light touch. This tool is more for light duty maintenance to prevent a callus ,if used regularly , than it is for grinding down a already present thick callus.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product. I received it last night as a birthday present from my daughter. I have always had rough feet and the pedicures I get always remove a lot of callus material, but is very short lived. I like that I will be able to keep up with the roughness and maybe even save money by not having to get the intensive callus treatments at the salons any longer. Much more sanitary this way, as I know that my feet are the only ones touching this tool! Time will tell if the unit will hold up, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: shelly.nurse

customer_reviews.title: POOR POWER - NOT WORTH PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: THis product would have strong potential, IF, IF, it has power. The only way of reducing calluses is by dropping the wheel on the callus until the motor essentially stops. IT TAKES FOREVER. I am looking for a similar product with MUCH more power. In summary, unless you are removing calluses the size of a pin head, I would not waste your time or money!
customer_reviews.author: Kirk B.

customer_reviews.title: Side panel of second callus remover falls out after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Update: 6-5-19 I bought a replacement and barely used it, maybe 2 times since I bought. Yesterday the side somehow fell out, leaving the internal wiring exposed. This is terrible quality. The device works well but not for very long! The callus remover worked well but the internal battery did not last very long. I must have recharged it a dozen or so times. Now the rotary barely moves and is very weak, not enough to use any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Bowles

customer_reviews.title: Great when it works, but not durable at all...  :-/
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a little over a year and started having problems after just a few months. When I plugged it to charge, it wouldn't always charge well. Now it's flat out not charging/holding the charge... :-( It was great when it was working properly. Much more powerful than those weak battery operated ones. So I'd give it 4 1/2 stars for its ability to remove calluses effectively and gently, but 0 for it's durability...
customer_reviews.author: Jade

customer_reviews.title: The best callus remover
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I have ever spent. The podiatrist would have cost me $35.00 and the remover cost me $25.00. I have major problems with my left foot: I have a large callus on the side of the big toe, and three callus’ starting on the bottom of my foot plus some dry skin around some toes. I have spent money on other callus remover which didn’t help me at all, plus I couldn’t use them on the dried skin around my toes. I love your product, it works, it’s a 5 star product as far as I am concerned. Jean
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jean Tremonto

customer_reviews.title: Battery dies really quickly
customer_reviews.text: At first it was working just fine. Then I noticed the battery died very quickly. Four days later after a full night I’m charging the product it did not work anymore. I spent money on a temporary working product that is of no use to me if I could I wouldn’t have purchased the si at first it was working just fine. Then I noticed the battery died very quickly. Four days later, after a full night of charging the product, it did not work. I spent money on a temporary working product that is of no use to me and if I could have avoided purchasing this item I would have done so.
customer_reviews.author: HBernie

customer_reviews.title: good when your between salon pedicure
customer_reviews.text: When buying this product, please know that it is mostly for regular upkeep of your feet. Don’t buy this thinking you will be able to remove thick calluses or the even thicker skin on the heels of your feet. IT WON’T!!! but if your feet are in good shape, this is the perfect product to keep your feet feeling soft and looking good. This product is useful between salon pedicures.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works On My Cracked Feet from Chemo
customer_reviews.text: I have been on chemo for an entire year for my autoimmune disease. Chemo dries me out so bad. No amount of water or lotion fixes it. I used this coupled with O'keefe's foot cream and wow! My dry cracked feet are feeling much much better. This was very easy to use. Very effective and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah T

customer_reviews.title: Worked on first attempt
customer_reviews.text: Apologizing in advance for my disgusting “before” pics shown, but this is just to show how amazing this thing is! I know it’s $30 but completely worth it. THIS WORKS MIRACLES!!! For the last year or so I was acutally embarassed of my bare feet and how bad they had gotten, and so I ordered this out of sheer desperation. All I did was soak my feet first for 10 min, then dried, and then began to apply throughout as instructed. Oh My Lord... this took off years of nastiness on the first shot! I would definitely recommend this to ANYONE who wants great results
customer_reviews.author: Weekend Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Must Have!
customer_reviews.text: I had a callus right on the ball of foot. I delt with this for years, using a pumice stone to shave it down as much as possible. It was painful and would build up everyday I spent on my feet. In one use this callus remover shaved it down to where I never thought it could be. The more I use it, the more is it is shaven away! It's crazy! No more pain, no more buying some gel pads or sticking to flat shoes. This is everything! I only wish I didn't have to charge it so frequently and long but other than that, it truly is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: There have been some low reviews of this product (not many, though) that say a negative thing about it is that it stops when you put very much pressure pressing on the foot. Which is true... except there's really no reason to press that hard. The device does the work for you. It works great, simple to use, definite, immediate results. I had hemmed and hawed about buying one of these as my feet got worse during the Covid lockdown period, and finally justified it by telling myself it costs less than a single pedicure. I'm very glad I did. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: SecretManta

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worst thing I ever bought. I used it once, then the charging cord quit working. Money wasted.
customer_reviews.author: tara N

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for smoothing rough skin
customer_reviews.text: I had a cast on my leg and foot for almost 4 months so lots of dead skin and hard calluses formed. I normally use a device that looks like a cheese grater to smooth my heels and the bottom of my feet. However, I thought I’d try a different approach. So I bought this electric callus remover. Well it worked perfectly and smoothed my skin right up. I did a little bit each day with lotion in between so I wouldn’t go too deep. Now my feet are nice and smooth and are much more comfortable now that I’m back to hiking. I even purchased the replacement rollers which I haven’t needed yet but will eventually. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T. Dore

customer_reviews.title: Does not last for long haul! And I really enjoyed its power
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed in this product I've had my pain out for two years and has yet to let me down rechargeable I've gone through two of these and neither one will last longer than a month I'm very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Candela

customer_reviews.title: So Pleased With This Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a powered callus remover before buying this one. I hoped that it would be worth the $$ and I am pleased to say that I love it! I still use my old weightlifting secrets on my calluses in the shower when they are soft. However, the best selling point of this product is that it is used on dry skin: no more soaking if I want a quick pedicure! No more scratchy feet that snag on fabrics (especially sheets...ewwww). I highly recommend the OwnHarmony Callus Remover to anyone, male or female, with rough-tough feet.
customer_reviews.author: sbodie29

customer_reviews.title: Product works as advertised but quality and probably longevity seem on the low side for the price
customer_reviews.text: Let me be clear, this item worked as it is intended to work out of the box. My issue is 2 fold. It looks flimsy and doesn't have much power. I would expect something moderately sturdy at the price paid. Secondly, the instructions say to charge it for several hours to maximize longevity. For me the green charged light came on after just a few minutes on the charger. I believe you can also over charge this item so this leaves me in a difficult position and strongly questioning the QA involved in manufacturing this item.
customer_reviews.author: Jeromy Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Only Product that WORKS
customer_reviews.text: Removes TONS of dead skin on my feet. Recharges and is ready to go back at it in 8hours. Comes with REPLACEMENT cartridges. No lotion or pedicure gets my feet this soft and removes all that white scratchy skin. I even use it on my hands which again, no lotion or manicure gets my hands soft and dead skin free like this gadget. BUY it and give it a try. The four is only because I have only used it twice since I got it the other day, and I can't comment on its durability and longevity; but seems well made.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bonato

customer_reviews.title: PROBLEM:  Roller Heads
customer_reviews.text: Reviews of this product looked great so I bought the product. I had been using Amope's Pedi Wet and Dry for a few years but wanted something that might last longer. Unfortunately, it isn't this product from Own Harmony. Every time I use it, one side of the roller blade flips out so I have to stop, turn off the motor, put the roller blade back in, then start over. It's frustrating and wastes my time as I try to get to work. Own Harmony, please return my money!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: This Product Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: Own Harmony Callus Remover is easy to use and gives results. I have had dry feet for years (runs in the family) and have used moisturizer several times a day followed by thick socks. This routine only worked for as long as the moisturizer was still wet. Once the moisturize dried up my feet were back to their original state. This callus remover quickly took off hard skin from my feet, but I did have to do my heels 2 or 3 times before they were baby smooth. The grinding of the stone against your skin does not hurt and the process itself does not take much time. I highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Horror Fan

customer_reviews.title: BEST THING OUT THERE FOR CALLOUSED FEET
customer_reviews.text: Ok y'all I've had them nasty dried calloused feet for YEARS. I would try every lotion and pummice stone out there and my callouses always came back. We'll, at 25 years old they're the worst they've ever been and I was really self conscious of my feet. ENTER THIS LIL THANG. it's incredible. It's liberating. Even after pedicures my callouses wouldn't be this well tamed. I used a moisturizing body cream on my feet after (CeraVe) and my husband said the results are NIGHT AND DAY. I'm sure after a few uses my callouses will be nothing but a bad memory. And in the picture you can't even tell I had such rough callouses! Amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: Mattie Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Did a great job on my terribly thick calluses
customer_reviews.text: I usually have a professional shave the calluses on my heels, toes and bottoms of my feet. My calluses are thick, they crack, bleed and effect the way I walk. Since we are not able to visit the professional, due to the Coronavirus, I purchased this product. I've only used it once. It did a fabulous job!!! I was able to reduce the callus on the bottom on my foot, near my toes that is difficult for a shaver to reach. I plan to use this in the future to extend the time between appointments with a professional service. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ralph

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: After reading many of the negative reviews, I feared the worst. First was the multiple complaints of problems removing the plastic cap over the grinding stone. As my pictures show, its super easy. Second was the many complaints of low power and stalling, but mine was great. Plenty enough power in my opinion. Cant understand what they'd be doing to cause it to bog down, but mine goes to hard. Then, the most concerning, was the complaints of it not working to take off calluses. This is not a razer blade, its a grinder. It turns my calluses to powder just as I would expect. I am so happy I chose this foot grinder. It is everything I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not powerful at all
customer_reviews.text: I was reluctant on making this purchase do to the reviews that stated the strength of its motor, but that I would give it a try. Wish I didn't make the purchase. Had the unit charge for over 24 hours and when my wife went to use it, I heard the motor bore down. I told her not to put too much pressure while using it. She said she was barely applying any pressure. With just a little pressure the roller stopped moving. I'm not one to send things back unless it's over $50. I'll take this up to "should have listen to my gut feeling".
customer_reviews.author: Brad Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Does a surprisingly good job
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! I have a callus from a surgery on my foot that was starting to become comfortable and manual exfoliators were not doing the trick. It comes with replacement rolls and a cleaning brush which is great. IF you do not apply too much pressure, it will not break the skin and actually you only need to use it for a few seconds for it to do what it is supposed to do. Compared to other electric foot files on the market, this is well priced and so far good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 1726

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: Highly anticipated waiting for your product to arrive, only took two days, and let me tell you I am extremely impressed! You have a customer for life! Works fantastic, does exactly what you said it would, I have tried many ways to take care of my feet but by far this is the best. Love the way it's shaped and easy to hold , has great power to get the job done! Thank you so much! Keep up the great work! Small American Companies doing it right! Definitely getting a 5 🌟 review from me. 😊
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Best customer service. Great product
customer_reviews.text: Power cord doesn't charge product. Need a replacement. Beware if you purchase to test power cord immediately. Update Customer service was great they sent me a new product immediately and issue has been resolved. Great company and highly recommended. They sent me a new product no hesitation and all is working now.
customer_reviews.author: Scott D

customer_reviews.title: I like it and use it
customer_reviews.text: I like it and use it, but not really strong enough. It takes a long time to get the skin off, and I don't have 20 mins a week to do this. When you uses it, it just stops, so you can't make it 'work harder' then it does.
customer_reviews.author: P. B. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: I was looking forward to use it....first experience: simply could not turn it on. It has some contact problem, it is on a bit, but stops. The spinning part flips out easily. Unfortunately it has a very cheap quality and unfortunately it is an absolutely useless product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished using this for the first time. It works GREAT and is going to solve some long-standing issues with ridges between my toes and calluses at the base of my big toes. I had NO IDEA how thick those calluses are. My shoes are going to fit better and I'm sure my feet are already happier. I had to make myself stop and get to doing some other things around the house and yard. It's so satisfying to have something that works easily and well and is taking care of the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Can’t apply pressure
customer_reviews.text: I went from using the silkn pedi pro to this. My silkn quit on me and I got sick of replacing it. Though the warranty covered it. So going from that to this is super disappointing. You can’t apply any pressure or it slows to stop and it doesn’t evenly remove dead skin. It’s basically like rubbing your feet with an emery board. I’m sure if you work diligently for a few hours you might make headway but I’m busy so I’m returning it.
customer_reviews.author: CEWP

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fail
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Also easy for the drum to pop out while in use. Whoever thought placing the indents to remove/add the drums at the end instead of at an angle or with a locking mechanism really undermined this product. This thing pops out, while half inserted and spinning, after about 30 seconds of use.
customer_reviews.author: Leinahtan

customer_reviews.title: Unit is weak against heels and does not hold a charge for more than 15 minutes
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device to smooth out my heels. What I found was that it is not strong at all and stops when pressed against the heel. Also, it just does not hold a good charge enough to do both feet. I think something that plugs into the wall would work better. I'm going to start shopping again.
customer_reviews.author: HughMac

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after one use. The thing that makes the roller spin sticks and won't move anymore. I only used it for less than 5 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Lee

customer_reviews.title: So much better
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy w this product. I was previously using a similar item, but different brand and this one is far superior. It moves quickly and doesnt slow down and stop when you apply pressure. It made a remarkable difference in calluses on the first use. I would purchase again and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: RubySparkles

customer_reviews.title: Very good but needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quick, great quality, and sturdy. I've tried a few in the past but this is brilliant. I gave it a quick run and wasn't disappointed. Has plenty of power to my surprise and worked while plugged into the outlet giving it thr max. Doesn't slow down when pushing against the skin (with an acceptable amount of pressure of course). ****Update**** Strangely when using the roller randomly falls and at one point scraped off the finishing from the device. Other than that works great
customer_reviews.author: Fady

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome callus removal especially for the price. I finally got this out this weekend and used it. I was so surprised by the power it had, I went out on the patio to use and within minutes my feet were baby soft. I didn't soak my feet just took the chance with hard dry feet and was so happy with the results. Soon as I was done I had to go show my he husband, he was also impressed. If your on the fence about this item just go ahead and buy it you won't be disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Neil Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Good product. Does what it's supposed to. Coarse wheel does great job on dry skin. Charge seems adequate, lasted for about 4 sessions, about 5 mins each. Charge seems adequate, set overnight so not sure how fast it was. Only slight minus, not enough to deduct a star in my opinion, is that charger cable tip is a bit hard to insert into handle. Just do it carefully and it'll go...and yes, I know it's keyed and that was not the issue.
customer_reviews.author: R. Aguilera

customer_reviews.title: It will do the job.
customer_reviews.text: The first one they sent me had a faulty charger. I think from reading other reviews they need to find a new supplier. That said, they did replace the entire product promptly and it does what it is supposed to. It would be helpful if the charger didn't need to be monitored and had an indicator to show when the device is fully charged. The instructions are rather confusing about how long you need to keep it plugged in. As if I am going to set a timer and come back when it's done? They don't want you over-charging it I guess so that should be built in.
customer_reviews.author: JMSAZ

customer_reviews.title: Only have used 3 times and it no longer charges
customer_reviews.text: I initially liked this product and have used it 3 times. Yesterday I went to use it and it died so I charged it for over 12 hours and the light never changed from red to green. It started like it was charged and then died within 2 minutes. I am very disappointed in this. Not sure if I can get a replacement or my money refunded since I bought this in July 2018 but I am sure going to try.
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: Good for only one time use
customer_reviews.text: It worked fantastic the first use but immediately thereafter became useless. I followed the battery charging advice to a T. I immediately unplugged it from the charger after the light turned green. The first time I used this product I got amazing results and I had thought I'd found the answer to sexy summer feet. The second time I used this, it was a total disappointment. The motor was so weak it stopped turning the second it touched my skin.
customer_reviews.author: dontcallmepammy

customer_reviews.title: Callus remover
customer_reviews.text: Just got my OwnHarmony rechargeable callus remover CR900. I am so happy with it. It is very fast, and convenient to have because being rechargeable beats having to go through so many batteries like I did with my old one. This one is just perfect and just the right size and power I needed. At first I thought that it would just be like my last one but I am so surprised at how this comes with everything you need to keep your feet feeling and looking beautiful. I really recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: What the heck is this supposed to do?
customer_reviews.text: The roller breaks off as soon as you apply a little bit of pressure. It also stops rolling with a medium amount of pressure. It doesn't do anything It is a waste of money. Don't bother, get a 2$ sandpaper instead and you are 100 times more successful. I hate this product. Went straight in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: B. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied. Got this for my partner and she totally ...
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied. Got this for my partner and she totally loves it. I’ve used it on her and seen the difference. All the dead skin comes off with ease and a little lotion after treating your feet makes it very soft. I will get one for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Ana V. Leonardo

customer_reviews.title: Blows Amope out of the water plus any other brand for women
customer_reviews.text: I am a woman and although this product says "Men", I felt I probably needed it as I have a callus in the middle of my sole and it feels as though I'm walking on a rock. This product does the job plus, plus, plus. I had previously used the Amope for women and it took several days of use to put on a pair of shoes and walk without pain. With this product, you need to use it for 10 seconds, feel the callus, and either desist or continue for another 10 seconds. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: david kroger

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This device is amazing. I have extremely bad calluses on my heels and toes. The doctor recommended getting an electric sander from the home improvement store to use on my feet. Then he was going to shave them. I found this and it works like magic. Since my feet were so bad it took a while, but it did the job. That was a week ago and my feet are still smooth. No more scary razor or sander. Thank you so much for this. The fact that you are family run and donate to underprivileged kiddos is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: It really works!!  Not just for men.
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product twice, but that is all it took to really make a difference and with the charge that came with! The speed and force makes it for a very good detailed job, in a faster amount of time. it is amazing! It comes with 2 extra rolls, a brush and charger. I bought this for the color, and is not just for men! My mom has another callus remover from another brand and I have to say that I prefer this one.
customer_reviews.author: CLAUDIA GONZALEZ

customer_reviews.title: A Light to Medium Duty Callus Remover that’s Part of a Solution for Callused Feet
customer_reviews.text: This Callus Remover works, but only for lighter use. I plan to use it for weekly maintenance. For thick calluses I would recommend a foot rasp. Here’s a link for one that works great (Be careful you don’t try to take off too much at once).  I’ve found that the Callus Remover is great for smoothing things out after using the foot rasp. Be careful not to press too hard. If you hear the motor bog down, you are using too much pressure. I would add that once your calluses are under control, using O’Keefe’s Foot Cream will help soften up the skin and heal any cracks.
customer_reviews.author: Tigger77

customer_reviews.title: Just wow!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a caregiver for my disabled husband and do not have time for pedicures. I also didn't want to take the chance of getting nail fungus like two of my friends who lost all their toenails from going to nail spas. This callus remover took care of some long-term calluses in no time. One of the reviewers said they had run out of power before finishing their feet. I had pretty bad calluses and I had plenty of power to finish the job. I had been using a manual remover but it just took too long and I didn't use it often enough. This is fast and trouble free.
customer_reviews.author: Penny W.

customer_reviews.title: Died in a little over a month!
customer_reviews.text: Just died today September 29 and I purchased it in August 14th. I am so upset. I loved it until it no longer served it's purpose. Return window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Stops charging fully after a month (same problem and I have purchased 2)
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd one I have purchased. It charges full for about a month and then it never charges to green again. The 1st one I thought it was the charger so I ordered a new charger and that didn't work so I ordered a whole new one and I can't get it to charge fully so it lasts maybe 3 min. Waste of my money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this product! Hate spending $45 or more on having a pedicure in a climate that sandals are worn almost year round and tried other products for my heels. The problem is I have arthritis and the time it took to file down the callus' made my wrists hurt. This Electric device is fabulous! It's light, it works well, the two different wheels (one is for really rough skin and the other smooths), files the skin down just right. I am really happy about the product, so much so that accidentally ordered but instead of returning the second one, I'm giving it to my daughter whom I know will also love it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: YOU WILL NEVER REGRET IT!
customer_reviews.text: I had been using a battery operated device that I now consider useless compared to this wonder! What a difference! It has removed years of old dead skin off my heels in a matter of minutes without hurting my feet. Goes on like butter! It is also easy to use and clean, recharges quickly and the replacement spare parts are quite handy. I can say AHHH !
customer_reviews.author: Milly O.

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted 4 months!
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and bought this cheaper device, strictly based on star rating (reviews).. Boy that was a mistake, havent had this but maybe 5 months, and used it only a handful of times, and it stopped taking a charge So I removed the bottom cover and all the wiring and batteries inside were fried!!! I do not recommend, and now I'm gonna see about that 18 month warranty!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Westbrook

customer_reviews.title: Still very Happy Feet
customer_reviews.text: I bought the rechargable callus remover about 14 months ago. I have been loving it! I went to the salon yesterday for my first pedicure for the year and she said my feet looked great! Asked if I was cheating on them with another salon. lol I'm so thankful for the quality products at Own Harmony! I'm a fan!! 16 months later I STILL Love my rechargeable callus remover. It is so very handy and easy to use!
customer_reviews.author: elsiesunshine

customer_reviews.title: so so
customer_reviews.text: Almost tempted to give it 2 stars. It works ok, but not powerful enough. My feet are not in the worst condition and I felt I had to be there so long to get the result I wanted and then you really have to be at it every other day or so to keep up the smooth feel. Typically by then the roller starts to lose its effectiveness. I just don't find it practical. I feel like I'd have to have 20 of these little rollers around to keep up. Great idea but needs to be stronger and longer lasting.
customer_reviews.author: R. Santos

customer_reviews.title: Best one I've used, so far.
customer_reviews.text: This thing works better than anything else I've tried. But it's not perfect. I've used it about 4 times now, in one week. Because the charge doesn't last long enough to fix my feet. Honestly, I'll need to use it probably 4 more times. Then my feet will be in good shape where I can probably just use it once a month. It does work good, on a full charge. But after about 20min of work, it's ready to be recharged. And if you give too much pressure it slows to nothing. I'd GLADLY pay double this for one that lasted longer and had better torque.
customer_reviews.author: Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: I just received my rechargeable callus remover today and I am already so in love! After letting it charge for the recommended amount of time I was so excited to get to try it out. I love to be barefoot and especially in the summer love to be on the sandy beaches so my feet dry out quickly and get pretty rough. This callus remover took all of my rough skin away and my my feet feel baby soft again! This is the best purchase I could have made and I am so happy I gave it a try! I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Shane

customer_reviews.title: to underlowered does not keep its charge
customer_reviews.text: i charged it for as long and as safely as i could but with such a horrible charger uint, instead of giving u a good usb charging cord they give u some stupidly horrid based charger that will cost to much to replace. it to under powered when using it it chugs very slowly when u press down to grind on your heel it does not keep a charge what so ever. ZERO way to even tell if the thing is charging never less if or when its full. im sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: It's not made of the highest quality of materials, definitely feels cheap, but it does its job pretty well. It's surprisingly fast, and strong. The grit wheels it comes with are also pretty cheap, the grit doesn't stay on very long, but it stays on long enough. For these reasons, I am giving this product a respectable 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Marston

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: I got my callus remover and I like it jus a little bit noisy and the hand end could of been some kind of rubber grip but all in all it works great and it does the job, really does the job, has indeed made my life way easier and I'm sure my grandmother is gonna love this bad boy..... thanks to Amazon and Own Harmony
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye thick skin
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done. I have thicker skin on the sides of my big toe and sometimes on the bottom of my feet too. I try to be diligent about it and keep it smooth, this product helped me enormously in doing so.it's easy to use, doesn't hurt at all, and gets the job done. I use it after I shower so the skin is a little softer and it makes it even easier. I have used it multiple times and only charged it once so far, so battery life is great. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Fernanda Nunes Ramalho

customer_reviews.title: Used shaver, beware
customer_reviews.text: Received the item with skin flakes falling out of the clear bag that the item was in. Also the formed plastic that holds the shaver inside the box was bent and beat up. This item is clearly a used item and returns should be checked more carefully with hygienic items. Update: company contacted me, after not wanting to repurchase once I received a used one, they sent me a new one, works good after trying it once, will need to use more to have a lasting effect.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work pretty good.
customer_reviews.text: Only had it a few days and used it 3 times. So far its working great. Easy to use, instructions are very understandable. I like the USB plug much better than a regular plug, easier to store when not charging. I have plenty of wall plugs for the USB cords from left over cell phones. So this was not an issue for me. Hopefully I will see a change in my callus soon. Is better than a pumice stone, which I struggled with for years. Would drop it occasionally in the shower and it would break apart. I can use this sitting down before I shower.
customer_reviews.author: Cheden

customer_reviews.title: Not very effective
customer_reviews.text: This product was not effective for the results in which I was trying to achieve. I was looking for one product that would allow me to up keep my heals/feet without giving my old achy shoulder such a workout. My feet are not abnormally calloused. I get pedicures every 6 weeks or so, and do my own up keep (every four to five days) in between. This product did not work as effectively as a pumice sponge and my scrubbing for 3 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: AHENYAN

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this item today. I can honestly say after one use, I’m extremely impressed with the results. I used it on my entire foot paying attention to mainly my cracked heels, then wiped them with a damp cloth and put some jojoba oil on them. My feet feel wonderful now. I really love this thing. Think I’ll buy one for each of my daughters for Xmas this year. Powerful and well made unit.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Don't think I could've bought a better unit.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dry cracked heels. it makes a tremendous difference and my feet haven't been the same since I started using it. I've used it nearly every shower since I got it. I did follow the advice in the comments for a callous remover and the O'keefes healthy feet. Both were good choices, especially at first. I don't need the callous remove much anymore, but still use the healthy feet. I love that I can also plug it in if I forget to charge it. I wouldn't say it can actually go strong off a charge for the whole 45 minutes, but it can go pretty far. If you're using it regularly it is just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service is second to none
customer_reviews.text: This has to be the best service I experienced after purchasing the item. The individual noticed item was ordered again asked me what's wrong with the original order. I explained it stop working, they replaced it, and gave me a refund. Since then they still reach out to me to ask how the new one is performing. I couldn't be happier. It does an awesome job on my feet and it seems to be stronger than the original. I assume the original had a defect and they went above and beyond to take care of me. I can't ask for a better service. I would recommend them any day. The service is second to none. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: David R.

customer_reviews.title: Good For Some Things
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item a while back and in my experience I like it, for the most part. I am giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because while it does well to remove calluses, it doesn't do much to remove dead skin. Like if your feet peel a little bit, it does not do much to help remove the dead skin. That being said, my trouble areas where I had the most calluses, this really helped, so it is a great product. It just doesn't do everything it advertises.
customer_reviews.author: Christine F

customer_reviews.title: awesome device
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWEsome! I have what my grandmother called "stones" in the bottom of my feet...really hard, small spots in my heels...hurts just like "stones", too. I'd resorted to cutting them out with scissors...yeah, I know, not a smart thing to do, especially for a diabetic. Well, this device just saved me for the practice...it safely & easily grinds them away, smoothing the calluses away, leaving NO "hard spots" behind. And the pain of the "stones"? Gone. AWEsome.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn J. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Enough Said
customer_reviews.text: I don't normally leave reviews for anything other than books, since I don't want you to know my personal business. Most particularly, I don't want you to know about my dry, cracked, frankly nasty heels.That sort of information just doesn't go with my image. But this product is amazing and works way better than even spa pedicures, which New York City specializes in for $50 and more a pop. I have only used this product twice but I'm already envisioning how much money I will save now that I don't have to pay a pedicurist extra to use a hacksaw on my feet...just to make me look presentable in flip flops. Well, enough said. More than enough.
customer_reviews.author: Michele W. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Really Works!
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the attached "Before" and "After" photos, this callus remover has been working remarkably well for my wife, for whom we purchased this item, truly doing wonders. Usually, something that seems too good to be true is indeed just that. Fortunately, this has not been the case here. Thank you, Own Harmony, for making this available!
customer_reviews.author: Credit Secrets Series Author

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says and fantastic results
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Like a fool I’ve been using Expensive moisturizers on my heels and just. Waiting to be disappointed over and over again. Look- sometimes it just takes a little elbow (or heel?) grease!! This has completely changed my ability to Walk around barefoot or with backless shoes and be confident showing my feet. Great little invention!
customer_reviews.author: Heather L

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I was really apprehensive to buy this, I go back and forth about buying things for myself, especially over $10, but I’m really glad I did. It works really well, comes with more heads than I had anticipated, and is easy to clean. The customer service is so awesome. They emailed me several times already asking how I liked it, giving me a list of usage tips, and seeing if there was anything they could help me with. I’ve had it for a week or so and have only used it twice, so I can’t speak on any long term usage, but so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: Less than expected
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is good once fully charged. It’s about 45-1hr. I’ve used this about 10 times and it’s not worth the money. It feels very cheap/flimsy and the discs that come with it are useless unless it’s used to maintain a recent pedicure. Not worth buying. I followed the instructions and saw very little difference. If the disc was more course, it may do better but my honest opinion is that a manual file works better and much faster.
customer_reviews.author: tam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for Calluses
customer_reviews.text: My humble review, product is outstanding for reducing Callus. Highly highly recommended to be bought. It comes with refills two of them and a brush to dust off. My review is honest and have nothing to say negative with the performance, durability, charging time is decent, use of machine isA good amount of time. Highly highly recommend nothing negative to say only positive (:
customer_reviews.author: Liliana

customer_reviews.title: MANLY Tool
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT for people who suffer from nephropathy. I use to go to the nail salon to get pedicures. The tingling and un-nerving pain of having someone scrape and rub my feet to get the callous skin off was agonizing!!! This wonderful tool lets YOU do the work. I was amazed of how it was gently removing the dead skin. I wish I would have has this tool YEARS ago. No more pain!!
customer_reviews.author: T. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Living in south Louisiana, I wear flip flops almost daily. As a result my heals can become quite dry and ugly. After my evening shower I used this product....wow.... It was great, removed all the dry, dead skin. When finished I put lotion as instructed and if I had painted my nails you would have sworn I had gotten a pedi at a spa. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than a medical bill and more efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Product is amazing. Working long hours on cold hard floors my feet kill me. Thought it was constant sprains or muscle issues but I thought try a callous remover first before spending a fortune at a doctor. I’m glad I did because this was my problem all along. And I’m glad I chose this version, over some of the others. It’s very powerful yet doesn’t rip your feet to shreds. Gets the job done and back on your feet in no time. (Yes pun intended. SUE ME! 😇) I’ll be looking for more Own Harmony products for future purchases. Thanks OH. You guys do great work.
customer_reviews.author: pjgasher

customer_reviews.title: Helpful customer service after my first one wasn’t working correctly
customer_reviews.text: After the first one I bought wouldn’t charge when I tried to use it again even after buying a new charger, I wrote a review about it and Olivia, their customer advocate, reached out to me about replacing my device. She was very helpful and accommodating and I received my new device and it so far works great. Thank you for your help!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dania

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are both enjoying the use of our callous remover so it helps to have the extra rollers. We’ve found it works best on clean but VERY dry feet, better than fresh-toweled out of the shower when they’re not as dry. Since we are not able to visit the nail salon due to Covid-19, this tool is a welcome alternative. Very happy with our purchase. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Deborah A

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this from seeing the reviews, I received this item on 4-22-18, my husband was using the other night and was not pressing too hard, and it stopped spinning and won’t spin anymore. I tried charging and replacing the wheel but it still won’t work. Contacted company and they sent me a new one and extended the warranty for me. I was happy to see that they stand ny their product. So far so good with the second unit.
customer_reviews.author: Dmvp0920

customer_reviews.title: Gears stripped
customer_reviews.text: After only using it a couple of times (Owned it for a little less than a year but it's been sitting in the closet most of the time and i've only used it a few times) the gears stripped inside and it no longer functions (you can hear the motor running but nothing turns). I would say it works well, but it is obviously very cheaply made, not surprised about it's early demise.
customer_reviews.author: Gideon Yong

product_meta.title: Electric Foot Callus Remover: Rechargeable Pedicure Tools for Men by Own Harmony -3 Rollers (Powerful) Best Professional Spa Electronic Micro Pedi Feet File Care Perfect for Hard Cracked Skin
feature_bullets: POWERFUL HIGH PERFORMANCE Motor: Features a Powerful High Torque Motor with over 2000 rotations per minute for an exceptionally smooth and soft touch; Tired of grinding your feet with pumice stone, grinder, sander, and grater-like tools? With this electric callous remover kit watch years of callused, dry, hard skin and cracked heels give way to smooth Happy Feet in minutes

COMFORT and BUILT TO LAST: Innovative callous shaver design gently and effectively buffs away thick and rough skin for effortless fast results; Ergonomically shaped handle, easy to use with a no slip grip; Improved safety lock button; Tough and Durable pedicure tools tougher than rasp, razor, scraper, sander, scrubber, pumice stone, and other grater like tools; 360 degrees Smart Precision convex curved rollers so you never miss a spot; Refillable roller heads made of premium quality micro pedi

RECHARGEABLE: Charge once, use multiple times; Portable, Lightweight; Built in long lasting rechargeable battery with over 750 hours lifespan so you can ditch the AA batTough and Durable: tougher than rasp, razor, scraper, sander, scrubber, pumice stone, and other grater like tools; coarse refillable roller heads made of quality micro pedi mineral crystals; Built in rechargeable battery with over 750 hours lifespan so you can ditch the AA batteries; eco friendly and a perfect gift set for him

SAFE and EASY to USE: No more skin cuts, irritation, and painful callous removal with Advanced Pressure Sensitive Technology; This professional pedicure machine is designed to protect soles of feet while gently exfoliating cracked heels and calloused skin; Enjoy Happy Feet with this quick and simple foot buff treatment at home; Splash proof for quick rinsing; Works with international voltage for Worldwide Travel

Carefully Selected Materials and Expertly Manufactured Products with Triple Tested Quality: We take Quality Control and Customer Happiness seriously and searched the globe to partner with trusted suppliers to bring you the latest quality and technology available; When you order your electronic foot file you can have Peace of Mind on your investment with our quality protection
